title: About the alpha tester thingy
body: So I enlisted to be an alpha tester since the first day the program appeared and i still did not received a respons. I do not mind waiting but i think i will not receive it because i know some friends that enlisted 2 weeks after the program started and they received the response that day

replies.body:
Invites for the Alpha Testing goes out in batches. We tend to look for players who are a positive influence in the community and will give some really great feedback. We tend to look for players who are really active and have no history of negative in-game behavior. Also, as the Alpha is not super-optimized at the moment, we're prioritizing invites for players who aren't currently running lower spec machines.

For complete details, check out our [Alpha Client FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/206201070-Alpha-Client-FAQ). Let me know if you have any questions.
Well i'm really not running a low spec machine
That's good news. This means that all that's left is to sit tight until you get an invite for Alpha client access. ^.^
